SwiftMessageFormat.name: MT306
SwiftMessageFormat.Description:
This message is exchanged to confirm a foreign currency option contract.
The confirmed transaction is covered by an ICOM (International Currency Option Master from the British Bankers' Association), ISDA (International Swaps and Derivatives Association), Deutsche Rahmenvertrag, IFEMA, FEOMA or AFB (Association Française de Banques) Master Agreement. These agreements are either signed or under negotiation. The message also caters for deals that are not covered by the above agreements.
The message is used to confirm/notify the details of:
a) a new contract between the parties,
b) an amendment to a previously agreed contract,
c) the cancellation of a confirmation,
d) a trigger event: knock-in/knock-out of an option, hitting of a trigger level,
e) the close out of an option.
It may also be used to report the details of a contract to a trade repository.
This message is exchanged by or on behalf of the institutions or corporates, party A and party B, which have agreed to a foreign currency option contract.
A money broker may also send this message to the two parties (party A and party B) for which he arranged the deal.
If there are two money brokers involved in arranging a deal between party A and party B, this message can also be exchanged between these money brokers.
Party A and party B are the legal entities which have agreed to the transaction.
Party A is either:
a) the Sender, or
b) the institution/corporate on behalf of which the message is sent, or
c) one of the institutions for which the broker arranged the deal and to whom it is sending the confirmation, or
d) when a money broker confirms to another money broker, the party for which the sending broker arranged the deal.
Party B is either:
a) the Receiver, or
b) the institution/corporate on behalf of which the message is received, or
c) the other institution for which the broker arranged the deal, ie, party A's counterparty, or
d) when a money broker confirms to another money broker, party A's counterparty. Specifics of the instruments covered List of instruments The options covered by the confirmation are:
a) Vanilla options (American, European, Asian and Bermudan),
b) Binary options (American or European),
c) Digital options with single or double trigger level,
d) Notouch options with single or double trigger level.
All options can also have a barrier. The barriers covered are single knock-in, single knock-out, double knock-in, double knock-out.
All options can be non-deliverable. Option styles a) Vanilla: The contract that provides the buyer the right but not the obligation to buy or sell the underlying currency at a predetermined rate with expiration determined by the expiration style. The expiration style is European, American, Asian or Bermudan.
b) Binary: An agreement under which a fixed amount is paid out if a specific condition is met at any time during the exercise period. The payment date of the amount is either when the condition is met (American) or at expiration date (European). The binary option has only "payment triggers".
c) Digital: An agreement under which a fixed amount is paid out if a specific condition is met on expiration date. The digital option has only "payment triggers".
d) Notouch: An agreement under which a fixed amount is paid unless a specific condition is met. The notouch option has only "no payment triggers". Expiration styles a) American: can be exercised on any date prior to and including expiration date as agreed by the parties to the trade.
b) Asian: can be exercised on the expiration date which is the last day of the determination period that is used to calculate the value of the underlying instrument of the option.
c) European: can be exercised on expiration date, at or before expiration time.
d) Bermudan or Mid-Atlantic: can be exercised on predetermined exercise dates as agreed to by the counterparts. Barriers a) Knock-in: The option has a specified spot level, which, if touched during the knock-in period, triggers the option into existence. Prior to that level being touched, no option exists.
b) Knock-out: The option has a specified spot level, which, if touched during the knock-out period, terminates the option. Non deliverable options (NDO) In respect of an exercise date under the non deliverable currency option transaction, the seller will pay to the buyer the In-the-Money amount, if positive, on settlement date in the settlement currency. The conditions and provisions as stated in the 1998 FX and Currency Option Definitions apply.
Some users have bilaterally agreed to confirm Non Deliverable Options in an MT 305 instead of an MT 306. This usage is based on bilateral agreements.

Validation.Comment: This field must not start or end with a slash '/' and must not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
This field must not start or end with a slash '/' and must not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
Function must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T36) :

Code.Name: AMND
Code.Description: Replaces a previously sent message with the amended one contained in this message. Used to add settlement agents to an MT 306 previously sent or to correct error(s) in an MT 306 previously sent.

Code.Name: CANC
Code.Description: Cancels a previously sent message. Used to cancel an MT 306 previously sent or to cancel an MT 306 which contains erroneous information.

Code.Name: NEWT
Code.Description: Used to send the MT 306 for the first time or to send a corrected MT 306 when the erroneous one was cancelled using an MT 306 with function CANC.

Validation.Comment: Scope must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T36) :

Code.Name: AGNT
Code.Description: Sender/Receiver is sending/receiving the message on behalf of a third party.

Code.Name: BILA
Code.Description: Bilateral confirmation, ie, Sender and Receiver are the principals.

Code.Name: BROK
Code.Description: Confirmation is sent by a money broker.

Validation.Comment: Option Style must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T64) :

Code.Name: AVRF
Code.Description: An Average Rate Forward has a pre-determined forward rate (agreed on trade date) which is compared to the average spot observations.

Code.Name: AVRO
Code.Description: An Average Rate Option is an option where the average of the spot prices is compared to the strike price on expiration date.

Code.Name: AVSF
Code.Description: An Average Strike Forward is a type of forward in which the forward price is based on an average of the spot rate over a period of time.

Code.Name: AVSO
Code.Description: An Average Strike Option is a type of Asian option in which the strike price is based on an average of the spot rate over a period of time. The dates used to calculate the average strike price cover the life of the option, and are referred to as the "fixings".

Code.Name: BINA
Code.Description: A binary option is an agreement under which a fixed amount is paid out if a specific condition is met at any time during the exercise period. The expiration style is European or American. The binary option has only "payment triggers".

Code.Name: DAVF
Code.Description: A Double Average Forward is a forward which combines the features of an average rate forward and an average strike forward.

Code.Name: DAVO
Code.Description: A Double Average Option is an option which combines the features of an average rate option and an average strike option.

Code.Name: DIGI
Code.Description: A digital option is an agreement under which a fixed amount is paid out if a specific condition is met on expiration date. The digital option has only "payment triggers" which may be single or double trigger level.

Code.Name: NOTO
Code.Description: A notouch option is an agreement under which a fixed amount is paid unless a specific condition is met. The notouch option has only "no payment triggers" which may be single or double trigger levels.

Code.Name: VANI
Code.Description: A vanilla option is a contract that provides the buyer the right but not the obligation to buy or sell the underlying currency at a predetermined rate with expiration determined by the expiration style. The expiration style is European, American, Asian or Bermudan.

Validation.Comment: Expiration Style must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T66) :

Code.Name: AMER
Code.Description: American: the option can be exercised on any date prior to and including expiration date as agreed by the parties to the trade.

Code.Name: ASIA
Code.Description: Asian: the option can be exercised on the expiration date which is the last day of the determination period that is used to calculate the value of the underlying instrument of the option.

Code.Name: BERM
Code.Description: Bermudan or Mid-Atlantic: the option can be exercised on predetermined exercise dates as agreed to by the counterparts.

Code.Name: EURO
Code.Description: European: the option can be exercised on expiration date, at or before expiration time.

Validation.Comment: Option Type must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T65):

Code.Name: CALL
Code.Description: Call option

Code.Name: PUTO
Code.Description: Put option

Validation.Comment: Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T36) :

Code.Name: N
Code.Description: The option has no barrier.

Code.Name: Y
Code.Description: The option has a barrier.

Validation.Comment: Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T36) :

Code.Name: N
Code.Description: A deliverable option.

Code.Name: Y
Code.Description: A non-deliverable option, ie, the option seller will pay the option buyer the in-the-money amount, if positive, on settlement date.

Validation.Comment: Type of Event must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T48) :

Code.Name: CLST
Code.Description: This is a confirmation of a close out.

Code.Name: CONF
Code.Description: This is a first confirmation.

Code.Name: KNIN
Code.Description: This is a notice of a knock-in: the option has a specified spot level, which, if touched during the knock-in period, triggers the option into existence. Prior to that level being touched, no option exists.

Code.Name: KNOT
Code.Description: This is a notice of a knock-out: the option has a specified spot level, which, if touched during the knock-out period, terminates the option.

Code.Name: OTHR
Code.Description: Any other event, as specified in the second subfield.

Code.Name: TRIG
Code.Description: This is a notice of a trigger hit.

Validation.Comment: Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50) .
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
In option J, Party Identification must be specified as a list of pairs (Code)(Value) and the following codes and format must be used (Error code(s): T78).

Code.Name: ABIC
Code.Description: followed by the BIC/BEI or UKWN if BIC/BEI not known

Code.Name: ACCT
Code.Description: followed by the account number

Code.Name: NAME
Code.Description: followed by the name

Code.Name: ADD1
Code.Description: followed by the first line of the address

Code.Name: ADD2
Code.Description: followed by the second line of the address

Code.Name: CITY
Code.Description: followed by the city (and state, country)

Code.Name: USFW
Code.Description: followed by FedWire Routing Number

Code.Name: USCH
Code.Description: followed by CHIPS UID

Code.Name: GBSC
Code.Description: followed by UK domestic sort code

Code.Name: LEIC
Code.Description: Legal Entity Identifier

Code.Name: CLRC
Code.Description: followed by a clearing code

SwiftFieldDef.Description: Type, Date, Version of the Agreement

Option.Name: H
Option.Description: Type, Date, Version of the Agreement

Validation.Comment: Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50) .
Version must be a valid year expressed as YYYY (Error code(s): T50).
Type of Agreement must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T47) :

Code.Name: AFB
Code.Description: AFB Master Agreement.

Code.Name: DERV
Code.Description: Deutscher Rahmenvertrag fur Finanztermingeschafte

Code.Name: FBF
Code.Description: Federation Bancaire Francaise Master Agreement

Code.Name: FEOMA
Code.Description: FEOMA Master Agreement.

Code.Name: ICOM
Code.Description: ICOM Master Agreement.

Code.Name: IFEMA
Code.Description: IFEMA Master Agreement.

Code.Name: ISDA
Code.Description: ISDA Master Agreement.

Code.Name: ISDACN
Code.Description: ISDA Master Agreement plus Additional Disruption Event Provisions for an Offshore Deliverable CNY Transaction

Code.Name: OTHER
Code.Description: Another type of bilateral agreement signed up front between party A and party B. The agreement must be specified in field 77D.

Validation.Comment: Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T67) :

Code.Name: B
Code.Description: Buyer: party A pays the premium and receives the payout amount if applicable.

Code.Name: S
Code.Description: Seller: party A receives the premium and pays the payout amount if applicable.

Validation.Comment: Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50) .
Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50) .
Time must be a valid time expressed as HHMM (Error code(s): T38) .
Indicator must contain the following code (Error code(s): T93).

Code.Name: D
Code.Description: Days

Validation.Comment: Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50).

(Error code(s): C05) .

Settlement Type must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T60) :

Code.Name: NETCASH
Code.Description: The underlying amount of the option is to be compensated against a foreign exchange deal and the seller of the option will settle the difference, in the counter currency, with the buyer. A non deliverable option (field 17F = Y) is cash settled with no foreign exchange deal behind it.

Code.Name: PRINCIPAL
Code.Description: The underlying currency amount and the counter currency amount are exchanged at the exercise of the option.

Validation.Comment: Method must contain one of the following codes, optionally followed with Additional Information (Error code(s): T68) :

Code.Name: BROK

Code.Name: ELEC

Code.Name: FAXT
Code.Description: Deal agreed per fax.

Code.Name: PHON
Code.Description: Deal agreed on the phone.

Code.Name: TELX
Code.Description: Deal agreed by telex.

Validation.Comment: Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)

Sign must not be used when Amount is equal to '0' (Error code(s): T14).

Validation.Comment: CreditDebit must contain the following codes (Error Code:T51)
One of the following codes must be used in Side Indicator (Error code(s): T36):

Code.Name: C
Code.Description: The clearing broker identification is for the client leg.

Code.Name: P
Code.Description: The clearing broker identification is for the Central Counterparty (CCP) leg.

Validation.Comment: The following codes must be used (Error code(s): T36):

Code.Name: N
Code.Description: The contract is below the clearing threshold.

Code.Name: Y
Code.Description: The contract is above the clearing threshold.

Option.Name: B
Option.Specification: (Identification of Instrument)(Description of Instrument) |(Description of Instrument)

Validation.Comment: The following codes must be used (Error code(s): T67):

Code.Name: A
Code.Description: Post-allocation

Code.Name: P
Code.Description: Pre-allocation

Code.Name: U
Code.Description: Unallocated

Validation.Comment: The following codes must be used (Error code(s): T67):

Code.Name: F
Code.Description: Fully collateralised

Code.Name: O
Code.Description: One-way collateralised

Code.Name: P
Code.Description: Partially collateralised

Code.Name: U
Code.Description: Uncollateralised

Validation.Comment: Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50).
Time must be a valid time expressed as HHMMSS (Error code(s): T38).
UTC Indicator must be a valid time expressed as HH[MM] (Error code(s): T39).
Sign ([N]) must not be used when UTC Indicator is equal to all zeroes (Error code(s): T14).
The following code must be used (Error code(s): T36):

Code.Name: Y
Code.Description: The transaction is non-standard.

Option.Name: Y
Option.Description: Financial Nature of the Counterparty Indicator

Validation.Comment: Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T67):

Code.Name: F
Code.Description: The party is a financial counterparty

Code.Name: N
Code.Description: The party is a non-financial counterparty

Validation.Comment: Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T36):

Code.Name: N
Code.Description: The collateral is posted on a trade by trade basis

Code.Name: Y
Code.Description: The collateral is posted at a portfolio level

Validation.Comment: Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T36):

Code.Name: N
Code.Description: The trade is not the result of a portfolio compression exercise.

Code.Name: Y
Code.Description: The trade is the result of a portfolio compression exercise.

Validation.Comment: Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T36):

Code.Name: N
Code.Description: No, the counterparty is domiciled inside the EEA.

Code.Name: Y
Code.Description: Yes, the counterparty is domiciled outside the EEA.

Validation.Comment: Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T36):

Code.Name: N
Code.Description: No, the reported trade does not fall under the definition of an intragroup transaction.

Code.Name: Y
Code.Description: Yes, the reported trade falls under the definition of an intragroup transaction.

Validation.Comment: Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T36):

Code.Name: N
Code.Description: No, the contract is not directly linked to the non-financial counterparty's commercial or treasury financing activity.

Code.Name: Y
Code.Description: Yes, the contract is directly linked to the non-financial counterparty's commercial or treasury financing activity.

fieldvalidation.name: U09
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "User has used tag 119 in a message that is not a candidate for special processing"

fieldvalidation.name: U12
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When populating an end-to-end reference, both fields 111 and 121 must be populated: a message that contains only one of these two fields will not be accepted by FIN."

fieldvalidation.name: U03
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Invalid format! Format must be 'xxxxxxxx-xxxx-4xxx-yxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx' where x is any hexadecimal character (lower case only) and y is one of 8, 9, a, or b."

fieldvalidation.name: C1
fieldvalidation.comment: C1 In sequence A, if field 12F consists of the code VANI, at least field 17A or field 17F must contain the code Y. Both fields may contain the code Y (Error code(s): D24)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence A, if field 12F contains the code VANI, then at least one of the following is required - field 17A with code Y or field 17F with code Y or sequence I is present."

fieldvalidation.name: C2
fieldvalidation.comment: C2 In sequence A, the presence of field 21 depends on the value of field 22A (Error code(s): D02)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence A, the presence of field 21 depends on the value of field 22A"

fieldvalidation.name: C3
fieldvalidation.comment: C3 In sequence A, the values allowed for field 12E depend on the value of field 12F (Error code(s): D26)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence A, the values allowed for field 12E depend on the value of field 12F"

fieldvalidation.name: C4
fieldvalidation.comment: C4 In sequence A, the allowed values for Type of Event (subfield 1 of field 22K) depend on the fields 12F and 17A in sequence A (Error code(s): D27)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence A, the allowed values for Type of Event (subfield 1 of field 22K) depend on the fields 12F and 17A in sequence A"

fieldvalidation.name: C5
fieldvalidation.comment: C5 In sequence A, the presence of fields 30U and 29H depend on the value of Type of Event (subfield 1 of field 22K) (Error code(s): D28)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence A, the presence of fields 30U and 29H depend on the value of Type of Event (subfield 1 of field 22K)"

fieldvalidation.name: C6
fieldvalidation.comment: C6 In sequence A, the presence of field 77D depends on the value of Type of Agreement (subfield 1 of field 77H) (Error code(s): D36)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence A, the presence of field 77D depends on the value of Type of Agreement (subfield 1 of field 77H)"

fieldvalidation.name: C7
fieldvalidation.comment: C7 In sequence B, the use of option F for field 30a depends on the value of field 12E in sequence A(Error code(s): E55)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence B, the use of option F for field 30a depends on the value of field 12E in sequence A"

fieldvalidation.name: C8-1
fieldvalidation.comment: C8-1 In sequence C (if present), if field 56a is not present, then field 86a in the same sequence C is not allowed, otherwise field 86a is optional (Error code(s): E35)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence C (if present), if field 56a is not present, then field 86a in the same sequence C is not allowed, otherwise field 86a is optional"

fieldvalidation.name: C8-2
fieldvalidation.comment: C8-2 In sequence E (if present), if field 56a is not present, then field 86a in the same sequence E is not allowed, otherwise field 86a is optional (Error code(s): E35)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence E (if present), if field 56a is not present, then field 86a in the same sequence E is not allowed, otherwise field 86a is optional"

fieldvalidation.name: C8-3
fieldvalidation.comment: C8-3 In sequence J (if present), if field 56a is not present, then field 86a in the same sequence J is not allowed, otherwise field 86a is optional (Error code(s): E35)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence L (if present), if field 56a is not present, then field 86a in the same sequence L is not allowed, otherwise field 86a is optional"

fieldvalidation.name: C9
fieldvalidation.comment: C9 The presence of sequence D and the presence of sequence G depend on the value of field 12F in sequence A (Error code(s): D30)
fieldvalidation.formula: If(In($value, "AVRF", "AVRO", "AVSF", "AVSO", "DAVF", "DAVO", "VANI"), D.$size > 0 && G.$size == 0, If(In($value, "BINA", "DIGI", "NOTO"), D.$size == 0 && G.$size > 0, true))
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The presence of sequence D and the presence of sequence G depend on the value of field 12F in sequence A"

fieldvalidation.name: C10
fieldvalidation.comment: C10 In sequence D, if present, ie, if field 12F in sequence A contains VANI , the presence of field 30P and the presence of field 30Q depend on the value of field 12E in sequence A (Error code(s): D31)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence D, if present, ie, if field 12F in sequence A contains VANI, the presence of field 30P and the presence of field 30Q depend on the value of field 12E in sequence A"

fieldvalidation.name: C11
fieldvalidation.comment: C11 In sequence D, if present, ie if field 12F in sequence A contains VANI , the allowed values for field 26F depend on the value of field 17F in sequence A (Error code(s): D33)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence D, if present, the allowed values for field 26F depend on the value of field 17F in sequence A."

fieldvalidation.name: C12
fieldvalidation.comment: C12 The presence of sequence E depends on the values of field 12F and Type of Event (subfield 1 of field 22K) in sequence A (Error code(s): D32):
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The presence of sequence E depends on the values of field 12F and Type of Event (subfield 1 of field 22K) in sequence A"

fieldvalidation.name: C13
fieldvalidation.comment: C13 In sequence E, if present (see also rule C13), the presence of field 30H depends on the value of Type of Event (subfield 1 of field 22K) and on the Expiration Style (field 12E) in sequence A (Error code(s): D34):
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence E, if present , the presence of field 30H depends on the value of Type of Event (subfield 1 of field 22K) and on the Expiration Style (field 12E) in sequence A"

fieldvalidation.name: C14
fieldvalidation.comment: C14 The presence of sequence F depends on the value of field 17A in sequence A (Error code(s): D43):
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The presence of sequence F depends on the value of field 17A in sequence A"

fieldvalidation.name: C15
fieldvalidation.comment: C15 In sequence F , the presence of the field 37L depends on the value of field 22G (Error code(s): D44)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence F , the presence of the field 37L depends on the value of field 22G"

fieldvalidation.name: C16
fieldvalidation.comment: C16 In each occurrence of sequence G , the presence of the field 37P depends on the value of field 22J (Error code(s): D46)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In each occurrence of sequence G , the presence of the field 37P depends on the value of field 22J"

fieldvalidation.name: C17
fieldvalidation.comment: C17 The presence of sequence H depends on the value of field 17A in sequence A (Error code(s): D47):
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The presence of sequence H depends on the value of field 17F in sequence A"

fieldvalidation.name: C18
fieldvalidation.comment: C18 The presence of sequence I, and the presence of fields 88a and 71F in sequence I, depend on the value of field 94A in sequence A (Error code(s): D74):
fieldvalidation.formula: If(A[0].F94A.$size == 0, Implies(K.$size > 0, K[0].F71F.$size == 0), If(A[0].F94A[0].Scope == "BROK", K.$size > 0 && K[0].F88a.$size > 0, Implies(K.$size > 0, K[0].F71F.$size == 0)))
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The presence of sequence K, and the presence of fields 88a and 71F in sequence K, depend on the value of field 94A in sequence A"

fieldvalidation.name: C19-1
fieldvalidation.comment: C19-1 In sequence I, field 15I may not be the only field, ie, if field 15I is present then at least one of the other fields of sequence I must be present (Error code(s): C98).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence M, field 15M may not be the only field, ie, if field 15M is present then at least one of the other fields of sequence M must be present"

fieldvalidation.name: C19-2
fieldvalidation.comment: C19-2 In sequence K, field 15K may not be the only field, that is, if field 15K is present then at least one of the other fields of sequence K must be present (Error code(s): C98).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence K, field 15K may not be the only field, that is, if field 15K is present then at least one of the other fields of sequence K must be present (Error code(s): C98)."

fieldvalidation.name: C20
fieldvalidation.comment: C20 The presence of subsequence B1 and of sequence C depends on the values of Type of Event (subfield 1 of field 22K) in sequence A (Error code(s): D16)
fieldvalidation.formula: If(In($value, "KNIN", "KNOT", "TRIG"), B[0].B1.$size == 0 && C.$size == 0, Implies($value == "CONF", B[0].B1.$size > 0 && C.$size > 0))
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The presence of subsequence B1 and of sequence C depends on the values of Type of Event (subfield 1 of field 22K) in sequence A"

fieldvalidation.name: C22
fieldvalidation.comment: In sequence M, when field 17Z is "Y" then 22Q must be present (Error code(s): C56).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence M, when field 17Z is 'Y' then 22Q must be present (Error code(s): C56)."

fieldvalidation.name: C23
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence I, if field 12G contains the code BERM then fields 30T and 22Y must be present."

fieldvalidation.name: C24
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence I, if field 12G contains the code AMER then field 30Y must be present."

fieldvalidation.name: C25
fieldvalidation.formula: If(In($value, "AVRF", "AVRO"), J.$size > 0 && J.F14B.$size == 0 && J.J1.$size > 0 && J.J2.$size == 0, If(In($value, "AVSF", "AVSO"), J.$size > 0 && J.J1.$size == 0 && J.J2.$size > 0, If(In($value, "DAVF", "DAVO"), J.$size > 0 && J.J1.$size > 0 && J.J2.$size > 0, J.$size == 0)))
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The presence of sequence J, subsequence J1, subsequence J2 and field 14B in sequence J depends on the code in field 12F in sequence A."

fieldvalidation.name: F-C08-1
fieldvalidation.comment: C22-1 In Subsequence B1, Premium Details, field 34B Premium Currency And Amount, the codes XAU, XAG, XPD and XPT are not allowed, as these are codes for commodities for which the category 6 commodities messages must be used.
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In Subsequence B1, Premium Details, field 34B Premium Currency And Amount, the codes XAU, XAG, XPD and XPT are not allowed, as these are codes for commodities for which the category 6 commodities messages must be used."

fieldvalidation.name: F-C08-2
fieldvalidation.comment: C22-2 In Sequence D, Vanilla Block, field 32B Put Currency And Amount and Sequence D, Vanilla Block, field 33B Call Currency And Amount, the codes XAU, XAG, XPD and XPT are not allowed, as these are codes for commodities for which the category 6 commodities messages must be used.
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In Sequence D, Vanilla Block, field 32B Put Currency And Amount and Sequence D, Vanilla Block, field 33B Call Currency And Amount, the codes XAU, XAG, XPD and XPT are not allowed, as these are codes for commodities for which the category 6 commodities messages must be used."

fieldvalidation.name: F-C08-3
fieldvalidation.comment: C22-3 In Sequence E, Payout Amount, field 33E Put Currency Amount, the codes XAU, XAG, XPD and XPT are not allowed, as these are codes for commodities for which the category 6 commodities messages must be used.
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In Sequence E, Payout Amount, field 33E Put Currency Amount, the codes XAU, XAG, XPD and XPT are not allowed, as these are codes for commodities for which the category 6 commodities messages must be used."

fieldvalidation.name: F-C08-4
fieldvalidation.comment: C22-4 In Sequence G, Trigger Block, field 32Q Put Currency Pair, the codes XAU, XAG, XPD and XPT are not allowed, as these are codes for commodities for which the category 6 commodities messages must be used.
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In Sequence G, Trigger Block, field 32Q Put Currency Pair, the codes XAU, XAG, XPD and XPT are not allowed, as these are codes for commodities for which the category 6 commodities messages must be used."

fieldvalidation.name: F-C08-5
fieldvalidation.comment: C22-5 In Sequence H, Non Deliverable Option Block, field 32E Settlement Currency, the codes XAU, XAG, XPD and XPT are not allowed, as these are codes for commodities for which the category 6 commodities messages must be used.
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In Sequence H, Non Deliverable Option Block, field 32E Settlement Currency, the codes XAU, XAG, XPD and XPT are not allowed, as these are codes for commodities for which the category 6 commodities messages must be used."

fieldvalidation.name: F-C08-6
fieldvalidation.comment: C22-6 In Sequence K, Additional Information, field 71F Broker's Commission, the codes XAU, XAG, XPD and XPT are not allowed, as these are codes for commodities for which the category 6 commodities messages must be used.
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In Sequence K, Additional Information, field 71F Broker's Commission, the codes XAU, XAG, XPD and XPT are not allowed, as these are codes for commodities for which the category 6 commodities messages must be used."

fieldvalidation.name: F-C08-7
fieldvalidation.comment: C22-7 In Sequence L, Additional Amount, field 32H Currency Payment Amount, the codes XAU, XAG, XPD and XPT are not allowed, as these are codes for commodities for which the category 6 commodities messages must be used.
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In Sequence L, Additional Amount, field 32H Currency Payment Amount, the codes XAU, XAG, XPD and XPT are not allowed, as these are codes for commodities for which the category 6 commodities messages must be used."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-22C-A
fieldvalidation.comment: FA-22C-A Common Reference must contain the bank and location codes of the Sender and Receiver, ie, their BIC without the country code(Error code(s): T95).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Common Reference must contain the bank and location codes of the Sender and Receiver, ie, their BIC without the country code"

fieldvalidation.name: FA-22C-B
fieldvalidation.comment: FA-22C-B This field consists of the bank and location codes (from the ISO Bank Identifier Code) of both the Sender and the Receiver of the MT 306. These codes must appear in alphabetical order (letters take precedence over numbers)(Error code(s): T96).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "This field consists of the bank and location codes (from the ISO Bank Identifier Code) of both the Sender and the Receiver of the MT 306. These codes must appear in alphabetical order (letters take precedence over numbers)."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-22C-C
fieldvalidation.comment: FA-22C-C Location Code 1 and Bank Code 2 are separated by four digits, which must consist of the rightmost non-zero digit of field 36 in sequence D, when the option style is one of 'AVRF', 'AVRO', 'AVSF', 'AVSO', 'DAVF', 'DAVO', 'VANI', or field 37U in the first occurrence of sequence G when the option style is one of 'BINA', 'DIGI' or 'NOTO', preceded by the three digits to the left of it. If there are no digits to the left of it, the space must be zero filled (Error code(s): T22).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Location Code 1 and Bank Code 2 are separated by four digits, which must consist of the rightmost non-zero digit of field 36 in sequence D, when the option style is one of 'AVRF', 'AVRO', 'AVSF', 'AVSO', 'DAVF', 'DAVO', 'VANI', or field 37U in the first occurrence of sequence G when the option style is one of 'BINA', 'DIGI' or 'NOTO', preceded by the three digits to the left of it. If there are no digits to the left of it, the space must be zero filled (Error code(s): T22)."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-22K-A
fieldvalidation.comment: FA-22K-A If Type of Event contains the code OTHR, Narrative is mandatory; otherwise Narrative is not allowed (Error code(s): D81)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If Type of Event contains the code OTHR, Narrative is mandatory; otherwise Narrative is not allowed"

fieldvalidation.name: FK-72-A
fieldvalidation.comment: FI-72-A The first line of field 72 should be of the following format: /8c/[additional information]. The remaining lines (2 - 6) should be of the following format: [//continuation of additional information] or [/8c/[additional information]](Error code(s): T32).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The first line of field 72 should be of the following format: /8c/[additional information]. The remaining lines (2 - 6) should be of the following format: [//continuation of additional information] or [/8c/[additional information]]."

fieldvalidation.name: FK-72-B
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Any line in field 72 should not start with code /PUSI/, /PUTI/, /USI/ or /UTI/."

fieldvalidation.name: FL-18A-A
fieldvalidation.comment: FJ-18A-A Number must equal the number of occurrences of the subsequent field 30F (Error code(s): D96)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Number must equal the number of occurrences of the subsequent field 30F"

fieldvalidation.name: ERI
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In an ERI field (i.e. fields 61, 72, 77A, 79, 86) the data part of a code word /OCMT/, or /CHGS/, is being validated, but the ending separator (i.e. third slash) is missing or the code words are duplicated."

fieldvalidation.name: FM-77A-ERI
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In an ERI field (i.e. fields 61, 72, 77A, 79, 86) the data part of a code word /OCMT/, or /CHGS/, is being validated, but the ending separator (i.e. third slash) is missing or the code words are duplicated."

fieldvalidation.name: FJ1-18B
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Number must equal the number of occurrences of the subsequent field 30M."

fieldvalidation.name: FJ2-18C
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Number must equal the number of occurrences of the subsequent field 30N."

fieldvalidation.name: FB1-37K
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Currency must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code or the code PCT (Error code(s): T52)."

fieldvalidation.name: FM-35B-A
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: M.F35B.Identification_of_Instrument + " is not a valid Identification of Financial Instrument. Required format is ISIN1!e12!c"

fieldvalidation.name: FM-35B-B
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Not a valid Identification of Financial Instrument. Required format is ISIN1!e12!c";

FormulaFunctionDef.name: IsSwiftSequenceEmpty
FormulaFunctionDef.description: Returns false if the sequence is empty. If the sequence has atleast one valid field present, returns true.
